name: Revisiting Things Past
description: Sisko and Odo have appeared years in the past, on Terok Nor, and you are with them. Their target? Gul Dukat! You are the only one with the skills to bring a useful weapon back online: a murderous hologram named Dejaren.
rules:
— Unique Bajoran, Cardassian, and Federation Faction Missions are available during the event. Open the Event to access them.
— Using any version of B. Sisko, Odo, or Dejaren will provide a bonus to Event Faction Missions.
— Every Event Faction Mission you succeed at earns you Event Victory Points. Collect Victory Points to unlock Event Threshold Rewards.
— In this event, Squadrons may also compete to advance up the Squadron leaderboards. Join a Squadron to get more rewards!
bonus_text: Crew Bonus: B. Sisko, Odo, or Dejaren
rewards_teaser: Reach Rank 1 by gaining Victory Points from Event Missions!

featured_crew.name: Odo
featured_crew.flavor: Disguised as a trader, Odo joined the Defiant crew in preventing the assassination of Captain Kirk by a time-traveling Klingon.

screens.text: "Ah, here again! It's Terok Nor, years ago. Last time was different... Sisko and I had Dax and Garak with us, but Captain, now YOU are here. I wonder what we are here for this time? Curious."

"I've spoken to some of the other Bajorans. There is a lot of unrest here. There's talk of assassinating Gul Dukat. Last time we were here, there was an accident, and we were wrongly accused. What if this time, before we can return to our future on Deep Space Nine...."

"You're suggesting that we go through with the assassination? If things are as they were last time, we won't actually be changing history, just replaying a scenario for some reason currently unknown to us. And it's unclear why the Captain is here."

"I have a theory. The Bajorans want to use a hologram to kill Gul Dukat, to deflect blame. Years ago, Starfleet had a hologram named Dejaren malfunction and kill people. We can use that, but the Captain here is the only one with the skills to bring back Dejaren. Will you help?"
"Ah, here again! It's Terok Nor, years ago. Last time was different... Sisko and I had Dax and Garak with us, but Captain, now YOU are here. I wonder what we are here for this time? Curious."

"I've spoken to some of the other Bajorans. There is a lot of unrest here. There's talk of assassinating Gul Dukat. Last time we were here, there was an accident, and we were wrongly accused. What if this time, before we can return to our future on Deep Space Nine...."

"You're suggesting that we go through with the assassination? If things are as they were last time, we won't actually be changing history, just replaying a scenario for some reason currently unknown to us. And it's unclear why the Captain is here."

"I have a theory. The Bajorans want to use a hologram to kill Gul Dukat, to deflect blame. Years ago, Starfleet had a hologram named Dejaren malfunction and kill people. We can use that, but the Captain here is the only one with the skills to bring back Dejaren. Will you help?"
